BrokerID.title: BrokerID
BrokerID.description: Broker ID (optional) is the ID identifying the broker who will hose the open house event. If the value is provided, you must find the ID before calling the flow

DateTime.title: DateTime
DateTime.description: DateTime for the open house event

PropertyID.title: PropertyID
PropertyID.description: Property Id (18 characters) that will host the open house event. You must find the ID before calling the flow

PropertyOpenHouseEventID.title: PropertyOpenHouseEventID
PropertyOpenHouseEventID.description: Open house event Id (18 characters) for the open house event being (re)scheduled. Value is required when the open house event is being rescheduled.
